title: Wood Elf
content:
Longsword, Shortsword, Longbow and Shortbow.

Wood Elf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Wood Elf subrace used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Wisdom. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose. ??

In Other Languages

Español (España): Elfo de los bosques
